import { Avatar, Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardMedia, Typography } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' const Blog = ({title, description, imageURL, username, id}) => { return (
{username ? username.charAt(0) : ""} } title={title} subheader="September 14, 2016" />

This impressive paella is a perfect party dish and a fun meal to cook together with your guests. Add 1 cup of frozen peas along with the mussels, if you like.
) } export default Blog
